core.verifyDescription:
You are strongly advised to [verify the SHA-256 hash](https://docs.getmonero.org/interacting/verify-monero-binaries) of the file you downloaded.

This will confirm that the files you downloaded perfectly match the files uploaded by the Monero development workgroup. Please don't underestimate this step, a corrupted archive could result in lost funds.
